name: ThunderousIntentionsDaily-Oklahomabasketball
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Are you a huge Oklahoma City Thunder fan? Then you need the Thunderous Intentions Flash Briefing Skill by FanSided to get the latest news, opinions and rumors on the Oklahoma City Thunder. 

The Thunderous Intentions is an Oklahoma City Thunder site brought to you by the FanSided Network dedicated to providing top-notch news, views and original content. This site also serves as a community for like-minded fans to come together to catch up on the latest news and to discuss their passion.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
